about_the_game:
Embark on a mythical quest in "Tears of Tiamat," a third-person action RPG set in a fantastical Age of Sail world, where you navigate the chaos unleashed by the awakening of the ancient sea goddess Tiamat, blending traditional warfare and magic in a quest to shape the fate of the world. Navigate this tumultuous era with your avatar, whose destiny is intertwined with the very forces that threaten to unravel the world. Will you align with the colonial powers in their quest for supremacy, or will you join Tiamat in her crusade to fulfill an ancient promise?

  • Explore an open-world environment with your avatar.

  • Fight against humans and monsters armed with a range of medieval and early modern-era weapons, as well as magic. Execute combos by alternating between magical and physical attacks, rewarding skill and timing.

  • Develop your avatar, buy custom armor and weaponry. Invest in skill trees to influence your magical abilities and physical combat style.

  • Find legendary artifacts to boost your avatar's powers and unlock unique abilities.
